title: Idaho Public Aerial Imagery
description: Browse a list of digital georeferenced aerial imagery layers managed by the U of I that don't have any access restrictions

title: U of I Licensed Aerial Imagery
description: Browse a list of licensed aerial imagery having access and use restricted to those affiliated with the University of Idaho

title: U of I Gallery
description: Browse a list of publicly-accessible resources managed by the University of Idaho to advance research, teaching, and outreach
